definition: Wang Ping (1962-2013), PRC crosstalk actor
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Wang
to rule/to reign over
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
surname Ping

sentences.english: Wang Ping wants to know about the TV University. He asks Liu Yunqing some questions.
sentences.chinese: 王平想了解電大，他就此向劉雲青問了一些問題。

sentences.english: Then Wang Ping crossed the river and submitted to Zhao Zilong, who took the defector to Xuande.
sentences.chinese: 王平渡漢水來投趙雲，雲引見玄德。

sentences.english: Wang Ping, born in Anhui Province in1971.
sentences.chinese: 王平，字喬生，1971年生，安徽桐城人。

sentences.english: There is a call from Wang Ping.
This is the first summer vacation Wang Ping and Chen Wei, two overseas students.
sentences.chinese: 這上留學生王平和陳偉在美國的第一個暑假。

sentences.english: Considering Wang Ping has only been learning English a year, he speaks it very well.
sentences.chinese: 就王平只學了一年而論，他的英文已經講得夠好了。

sentences.english: According to Wang, the generation born later 1980 fashions a crowd of customers by her store.
sentences.chinese: 王平表示，自己網店的主要顧客都是80後。

sentences.english: After exchanging some blows, Wang Ping pretended to flee.
sentences.chinese: 王平與孟獲打了幾回合，就假裝失敗逃跑。

sentences.english: Wang Ping described for him the geography of the Han River area.
Considering Wang Ping has only been learning English a year , he speaks it very well .
sentences.chinese: 就王平只學了一年而論，他的英文已經講的夠好了。
